rules_text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, choose one –
• Put a charge counter on Timeworn Etchings.
• Remove a charge counter from Timeworn Etchings. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
flavor_text: [i]Others in Arietta's position had chosen to worship the etchings. She chose to learn from them.[/i]
